name: Deaf Wish
description:
You're playing as Lily - a young girl with major signs of SLS. (Shit-Life-Syndrome)

Her dad left, her mum's mentally unstable and she's deaf.

Long story short: She has to uncover and heal a lot of trauma which mostly gets processed while she dreams. Your job is to ensure that she makes it through alive.

I don't wanna spoil too much here since there are a few twists in the story so I'd appreciate you trying out the demo and judging it for yourself.

You'll find all additional info about this game on its Kickstarter page!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/charity4free/deaf-wish
